First we load the sheet from Google Forms.
```{r}
library(googlesheets4)
library(dplyr)
x <- read_sheet('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/144HYA5zJPYgjzJqqMeKYSoY1UBc24wjl8iE5P6-cdAM/edit?usp=sharing')
head(x)
```

Then, we proceed to drop some rows
```{r}
x <- x %>% select(-timestamp)
```
